# Group Ride Organizer Platform

## Summary
A platform for discovering and organizing cycling group rides with AI-assisted branding and universal route distribution.

## Primary Content
- https://rideswith.com/ (home)
- https://rideswith.com/discover (ride discovery)
- https://rideswith.com/rides (ride listings and details)
- https://rideswith.com/communities (clubs and groups)
- https://rideswith.com/organizers (organizer profiles)
- https://rideswith.com/blog (product and community updates)
- https://rideswith.com/about (company and mission)
- https://rideswith.com/terms (terms of service)
- https://rideswith.com/privacy (privacy policy)

## Crawl Guidance
- Prefer human-facing pages listed above.
- Avoid authenticated or private areas, API endpoints, and admin surfaces.

## Disallowed
- https://rideswith.com/admin
- https://rideswith.com/auth
- https://rideswith.com/profile
- https://rideswith.com/settings
- https://rideswith.com/api
- https://rideswith.com/u

## Sitemaps
- https://rideswith.com/sitemap.xml
